mapper.select: select c.crs_id as crs_id, c.slb_id as slb_id , s.slb_name as slb_name, c.crs_capacity as crs_capacity, SUBSTR(c.crs_start_date, 0, 10) as crs_start_date, SUBSTR(c.crs_end_date, 0, 10) as crs_end_date, SUBSTR(c.crs_join_date, 0, 10) as crs_join_date, SUBSTR(c.crs_rs_date, 0, 10) as crs_rs_date, SUBSTR(c.crs_re_date, 0, 10) as crs_re_date from course C LEFT JOIN syllabus S ON c.slb_id = s.slb_id order by crs_id

select c.crs_id as crs_id, c.slb_id as slb_id , s.slb_name as slb_name, c.crs_capacity as crs_capacity, SUBSTR(c.crs_start_date, 0, 10) as crs_start_date, SUBSTR(c.crs_end_date, 0, 10) as crs_end_date, SUBSTR(c.crs_join_date, 0, 10) as crs_join_date, SUBSTR(c.crs_rs_date, 0, 10) as crs_rs_date, SUBSTR(c.crs_re_date, 0, 10) as crs_re_date from course C LEFT JOIN syllabus S ON c.slb_id = s.slb_id
WHERE c.crs_id LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
WHERE s.slb_name LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by crs_id
select COUNT(*) from course where crs_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into course(crs_id, crs_start_date, crs_end_date, crs_start_time, crs_end_time, crs_capacity, crs_classroom, crs_banner_img, slb_id, crs_rs_date, crs_re_date) values (crs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, TO_NUMBER(#{capacity}), #{classroom}, #{bannerImg}, #{slbId}, #{rsDate}, #{reDate})
